text: Edward Russell Meekins Jr. (1949 - September 13, 2020) was an American politician. He was a member of the Alaska House of Representatives between 1973 to 1975 and again from 1977 to 1983. His father Russ Meekins Sr. was also a politician. Meekins was a member of the Democratic Party. He was born in Anchorage, Alaska. Meekins Jr. died on September 13, 2020 in Massachusetts at the age of 71. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2020 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Anchorage, Alaska Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Russ Meekins Jr.
